data.field: Perfect for me. Okay, but my first choice was taken. Regrettable; all the good ones were taken. Chosen too quickly; I should have given it more thought. Poorly considered; people assume I'm a doofus. Too long for the CB; what was I thinking? My real name; blame my parents. Pretty bad, since I totally lack creativity. Coincidentally also the pseudonym of a local serial killer. At least better than something awful like 'Petruchio'. Not well-characterized by any of these poll options.
